name: Alertness
description: Noticing things, being aware of your surroundings and changes in them.

name: Athletics
description: Physical fitness and movement, from running to jumping to dodging.

name: Burglary
description: Bypassing security systems, lockpicking, pickpocketing, and other thievery.

name: Contacts
description: Knowing people, having a network of information sources.

name: Conviction
description: Mental fortitude, faith, and the strength of your beliefs. Used for spellcasting power.

name: Craftsmanship
description: Making and fixing things, from carpentry to car repair.

name: Deceit
description: Lying, disguise, and other forms of deception.

name: Discipline
description: Mental control, concentration, and precision. Used for spellcasting control.

name: Driving
description: Operating vehicles, from cars to boats to aircraft.

name: Empathy
description: Understanding others' emotions and motivations.

name: Endurance
description: Physical stamina and resistance to harm.

name: Fists
description: Unarmed combat, from boxing to martial arts.

name: Guns
description: Using firearms of all types.

name: Intimidation
description: Scaring people, threatening them, or otherwise using fear as a tool.

name: Investigation
description: Finding clues, researching, and putting together information.

name: Lore
description: Knowledge of the supernatural world, including creatures, magic, and the Nevernever.

name: Might
description: Physical strength and the application of force.

name: Performance
description: Artistic expression, from music to acting to public speaking.

name: Presence
description: Force of personality, leadership, and making an impression.

name: Rapport
description: Making friends, being likeable, and social interaction.

name: Resources
description: Material wealth and the ability to acquire things.

name: Scholarship
description: General education and knowledge of mundane topics.

name: Stealth
description: Hiding, sneaking, and avoiding detection.

name: Survival
description: Thriving in hostile environments, tracking, and outdoorsmanship.

name: Weapons
description: Using melee weapons, from swords to clubs to improvised weapons.
